name: Tang Chi
overview: Tang Chi is a single player, mouse controlled, tangram puzzle game. The game opens in a window in the centre of the screen, however it is not fixed in this position and can be moved around the screen but it cannot be resized. Tangram puzzles use seven tiles to create specific patterns and this game is no different. The target pattern is displayed as silhouette in the upper left and the player uses the mouse to position and rotate the tiles to recreate it. All puzzles are timed
